code: import _objectSpread from"/home/capslock/team_envy/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import*as types from"../types/types";var initalState={loading:true,data:[],contactsData:[],messageData:[]};var smsReducer=function smsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.FETCH_DATA_BEGIN:return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:true});case types.FETCH_CONTACT_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:false,contactsData:action.payload});case types.FETCH_MESSAGE_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:false,messageData:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default smsReducer;
